title: Christmas chocolate pudding
ingredients: ['6 eggs, separated', '250g caster sugar', '250g dark chocolate, grated', '2 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '120g plain flour, sieved', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 pinch salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
